title: thank you riot
body: Thank you for making the changes and especially taking away feral flare. Thank you to all the crap bronzies especially the trolls for continually giving me hope of getting out of b5 to then crushing me and make me lose my promos time after time. Since I angrily had a break, I have my life back and money in my pocket, my depression isn't as severe and im getting off my fat bum and doing things to better my life, like house chores. I don't regret the year I spent playing league, i have made some awesome friends. Thanks again. here here to a new energized year ahead of me #gitgud{{champion:114}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3160}}
